descriptor.name: Introduction to Equinox
descriptor.description: This tutorial will introduce the developer to OSGi development on Eclipse Equinox.

descriptor.name: Spring Batch Admin Webapp
descriptor.description: A WAR project for a Spring Batch Admin web application with simple custom job

descriptor.name: Simple Spring Batch Project
descriptor.description: A simple project that shows how to use Spring Batch with a reader and a writer in a single step job

descriptor.name: Spring Faces Project
descriptor.description: A new Spring and JavaServerFaces web application development project

descriptor.name: Spring MVC Project
descriptor.description: A new Spring MVC web application development project

descriptor.name: Shared Library Bundle Project
descriptor.description: A software library that exposes Java types and classes usable by other bundles (example: commons-collections)

descriptor.name: Shared Service Bundle Project
descriptor.description: A bundle that exports Spring-managed OSGi services consumable by other bundles (example: the financial RewardNetwork from the SpringSource training curriculum)

descriptor.name: Shared Services WAR Project
descriptor.description: A web application archive that can consume shared services (example: rewardsonline from the SpringSource training curriculum)

descriptor.name: Simple Spring Utility Project
descriptor.description: A simple jar project that has some Spring configuration and an integration test

descriptor.name: Spring Web Flow Project
descriptor.description: A new Spring MVC web application development project that includes Spring Web Flow

descriptor.name: Introduction to Equinox
descriptor.description: This tutorial will introduce the developer to OSGi development on Eclipse Equinox.

descriptor.category: Spring Dynamic Modules for OSGi(tm) Runtimes
descriptor.name: Creating inter-bundle bean references using OSGi services
descriptor.description: This tutorial demonstrates how to expose beans from a module context as services in the OSGi service registry, and how to inject references to services published in the OSGi service registry.

descriptor.name: Writing an OSGi bundle
descriptor.description: This short tutorial shows you how to create a simple OSGi bundle using the SpringSource Tool Suite.

descriptor.category: Spring Dynamic Modules for OSGi(tm) Runtimes
descriptor.name: Creating a Spring-powered OSGi bundle with Spring Dynamic Modules
descriptor.description: This tutorial demonstrates how to create and launch an OSGi bundle that is powered by Spring (has a module context automatically created for it when the bundle is started) using Spring Dynamic Modules and the Eclipse PDE tools.

descriptor.name: Understanding the Lifecycle of an OSGi Bundle
descriptor.description: This tutorial explains the lifecycle of an OSGi bundle and how it relates to class loading. You will learn what happens when a bundle is started and stopped, and the difference between the update and refresh operations.

descriptor.name: Understanding Versioning in OSGi
descriptor.description: This tutorial demonstrates how OSGi can support multiple versions of a library or package deployed concurrently, and how a client can choose between versions.

descriptor.name: Securing your web application with Spring Security
descriptor.description: This tutorial shows how to configure simple role-based security for a standard web application.

descriptor.name: What's new in Spring 2.5
descriptor.description: This cheat sheet demonstrates key concepts that are new in Spring 2.5.

descriptor.name: Adding Management to Your Spring Applications
descriptor.description: This tutorial demonstrates how to instrument your Spring applications for management using Spring, JMX and AOP.

descriptor.name: Getting Started with Spring JDBC
descriptor.description: This tutorial shows how to get started using Spring JDBC for simple data access.

descriptor.name: Creating JMS-enabled Spring application
descriptor.description: This tutorial provides an overview of JMS features with the Spring Framework.

descriptor.name: Integration Testing with JUnit 4
descriptor.description: This tutorial will walk developers through the process of creating a JUnit 4 integration test.

descriptor.name: Integration Testing with JUnit 3 and Spring
descriptor.description: This tutorial will show you how to implement integration tests using the Spring JUnit 3.8 testing framework.

descriptor.name: Integration Testing with JUnit 3 and the Spring TestContext Framework
descriptor.description: This tutorial will show you how to implement integration tests using the Spring 2.5+ TestContext framework and JUnit 3.

descriptor.name: Adding Declarative Transaction Management to Your Spring Applications
descriptor.description: his tutorial demonstrates how to apply Spring's support for declarative transaction management.

descriptor.name: Using Stored Procedures
descriptor.description: A tutorial for getting started using stored procedures.

descriptor.name: Creating a Controller
descriptor.description: This tutorial will walk developers through the process of creating a @Controller to implement a basic use case end-to-end.

descriptor.name: Spring Web Development Overview
descriptor.description: This tutorial provides an overview of web development with the Spring Framework.

descriptor.name: Hotel Booking Reference App (Spring MVC + Web Flow + JavaServerFaces version)
Get Started with Spring Web Flow
descriptor.description: Learn how to use the Web Flow framework in your Spring application.

descriptor.name: Creating a contract-first web service
descriptor.description: This tutorial shows you how to create a contract-first web service with Spring-WS. The contract-first approach is an industry recognized best practice. In short it means we'll design an XML contract first and a Java implementation second.
